094275EB.Line13.8C8F8: He spends his days in a fog of white smoke at the riverbank. Be careful, itâ€™s a dangerous place.

5A431858.Line1.8C8F8: Wait... what about the old man?

A336EF6D.Line15.8C8F8: Hmph, but you look desperate enough to try anything.

C94C7E85.VoiceDir1.8C8F8: A sudden thought hits you out of the blue, but you're not sure it's a good idea...

F43791C6.Line3.8C8DF: (scoff) The only thing that unreliable fool will guide you to is your graves...
